programlisting:
<CsoundSynthesizer> <CsOptions> -odac </CsOptions> <CsInstruments> nchnls = 2 0dbfs = 1 ksmps = 8 sr = 44100
instr hdf5read
aArray[], aVar, kVar hdf5read "example.h5", "aArray", "aVar", "kVar" ; Open hdf5 file and read variables
aLeft = (aArray[0][0] + aArray[0][1] + aVar) / 3 ; Add audio signals together for stereo out aRight = (aArray[1][0] + aArray[1][1] + aVar) / 3
outs aLeft * kVar, aRight * kVar ; Multiply audio signals by k-rate signal endin
</CsInstruments> <CsScore>
i "hdf5read" 0 1
</CsScore> </CsoundSynthesizer>
